short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple timer extension to be there when you need a timer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Simple Timer Extension is a lightweight and intuitive tool designed to help you manage your time effectively. Whether you're focusing on a task, practicing a skill, or simply tracking your activities, this extension provides a hassle-free timer experience right in your browser.

Key Features:

User-Friendly Interface:
Clean and minimalistic design for a distraction-free experience.
Easy-to-read timer display with minutes and seconds.
Control at Your Fingertips:
Start, pause, and reset buttons for quick timer management.
Seamless user interaction for a smooth experience.
Flexible Time Tracking:
Track time intervals for any activity, from short breaks to longer tasks.
Conveniently reset the timer for a fresh start.
